name: Love Hurts Varsity Jacket

brandingTech.logo: center chest: Stylized text graphic 'Love Hurts' in a script font with a small heart or crown detail above the 't' in 'Hurts', and smaller, illegible text underneath. The main text is red with a white/silver outline.; inside hood lining: Repeating pattern of stylized roses and leaves.

logos.description: Stylized script text 'Love Hurts' with 'EST. MMXXIV' underneath
logos.color: red with white outline/shadow for 'Love Hurts', white for 'EST. MMXXIV'

logos.description: Repeating floral pattern of roses and leaves
logos.color: orange/brown roses, green leaves, white background
logos.size: full coverage of the inside hood lining, individual roses approx 1-2 inches in diameter

logoFingerprint.notes: The main text 'Love Hurts' exhibits a raised, smooth, and slightly glossy texture consistent with a silicone application. The hood lining pattern shows no surface texture and appears integrated into the fabric, characteristic of sublimation printing. The ribbed cuffs and hem are structural elements with striped patterns inherent to their knit, not applied branding.

setting: Grand baroque staircase, crimson carpet, dramatic shadows and candlelight
